data.title: Northern California Composers
data.text:
This finding aid is an ever-updated listing of composers active in Northern California since the 1840s. All names included may be found in dictionaries and directories - both published and unpublished - from 1934 to the present.

Entries give birth dates, death dates and birthplaces - when available - as well as abbreviated citations for additional biographical information. Because some citations are 35 years old or more, death dates are not always included.

For information about Northern California composers on the Internet, see links at individual names.
